dt-option.name: searchPanes.i18n.showMessage
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the Show button

type.description:
Setting the `-init searchPanes.i18n.showMessage` option to a string of your choice allows the Show All button to have custom text within it.
This property is passed through an `-api i18n()` function.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.i18n.showMessage` parameter is `"Show All"`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will set the message to be displayed in the Show button to 'Show All'. This property allows that message to be configured.
This option allows direct configuration on the language options for the SearchPanes instance. At this time using `language.searchPanes.showMessage` has the same effect as setting this option. If both are provided, this will take preference, We've made this change for consistency in our APIs moving forward.
